ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates mouse-dragging of X and Y Axis to scale using the YAxisDragModifier and XAxisDragModifier. These are a built-in ChartModifierBase derived classes which add the behavior of scaling on mouse-drag of each axis.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Showcases how to add Axis-Drag scaling to a SciChartSurface using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.YAxisDragModifier.html']YAxisDragModifier[/url] and [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.XAxisDragModifier.html']XAxisDragModifier[/url]. ChartModifiers can be added to the SciChartSurface via the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.SciChartSurface~ChartModifier.html']SciChartSurface.ChartModifier[/url] property, or via a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.ModifierGroup.html']ModifierGroup[/url]
By default, the X and YAxisDragModifier apply to all axes on the chart. You can restrict them to a single axis using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.AxisDragModifierBase~AxisId.html']AxisAxisDragModifierBase.AxisId[/url] property. Or, you can include or include individual axis via the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.YAxisDragModifier~IncludeAxisProperty.html']YAxisDragModifier.IncludeAxis[/url] or [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.XAxisDragModifier~IncludeAxisProperty.html']XAxisDragModifier.IncludeAxis[/url] attached properties.
Finally, drag modifiers can be used in Absolute mode (when YAxis.AutoRange=false) as well as Relative mode (when YAxis.AutoRange=true).
